information.name: ucrm-client-signup-plugin
information.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend form for clients to signup, and select payment plans, pay for initial installation, and subscribe to a service.
information.author: Charuwts, LLC

configuration.label: Stripe Secret Key
configuration.description: Make sure, you use LIVE credentials on production.

configuration.label: Stripe Endpoint Secret
configuration.description: This plugin uses stripe webhook signatures to validate payloads. https://stripe.com/docs/webhooks/signatures

configuration.label: Form Title
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before form description

configuration.label: Form Description
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before the form. (Can contain HTML)

configuration.label: Completion Text
configuration.description: Text shown upon signup completion. (Text Only) - Defaults To: Thank you for signing up! You will receive an invitation to access your account upon approval.

configuration.label: Auto Invoice
configuration.description: Write TRUE in this textfield to send invoices to clients upon invoice being paid in full.
